title: Venue or location
description: Hosting a generative art exhibition offers venues the opportunity to receive a commission on artwork sales, while also being promoted on the GeneratedArt platform. This creates a mutually beneficial partnership between the exhibition service provider and the venue.

title: Artist
description: Exhibiting generative art in different locations offers increased exposure, diverse feedback, networking opportunities, cultural exchange, and professional development for artists.

title: Collector
description: Discovering generative art exhibitions in different spaces throughout a city offers collectors a unique experience, access to exclusive artwork, fun generative art tours in trendy places, and potential investment opportunities.
